subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After an arrest, a factory job, a stint in the Marines and a role at Ball State, Brandon Crawford, 33, may achieve his dream this week when the N.F.L. holds its draft.
snippet: After an arrest, a factory job, a stint in the Marines and a role at Ball State, Brandon Crawford, 33, may achieve his dream this week when the N.F.L. holds its draft.
